title: Bitcoin Breakout: Analysts Reveal the Pivotal $95K Level That Could Spark a Surge
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Breakout: Analysts Reveal the Pivotal $95K Level That Could Spark a Surge Is Bitcoin finally ready to shake off its recent slump and make a powerful move upward? After months of consolidation, analysts are now pointing to clear technical signals suggesting a major Bitcoin breakout could be imminent. The key level to watch? A decisive push above a critical downtrend line that could propel BTC toward $95,000 and beyond. Let‚Äôs examine the data and expert opinions shaping this optimistic forecast. Why Are Analysts Bullish on a Bitcoin Breakout Now? Several converging factors are giving market watchers confidence. First, a significant options expiry event has passed. Trader BitBull, with a substantial following, noted that the expiration of roughly $24 billion in options could remove a major source of selling pressure. This ‚Äòhedging overhang‚Äô often suppresses spot prices. Its removal typically allows for cleaner price discovery, potentially clearing the path for a sustained Bitcoin breakout . Furthermore, the broader sentiment suggests the crypto market remains undervalued. Prominent analyst Micha√´l van de Poppe has echoed this, stating that the current landscape could set the stage for new all-time highs in the coming months. This foundational belief in underlying value adds weight to the technical setup currently forming on the charts. The Technical Case for a Move to $95K The most compelling evidence comes from the price chart itself. Analysis firm Crypto Ideology has highlighted a crucial pattern. Bitcoin‚Äôs daily price candle is currently testing a two-month resistance line that has capped every rally since October. This line represents the dominant downtrend. The Resistance Line: A diagonal trendline connecting the lower highs since Bitcoin‚Äôs peak. The Breakout Signal: A daily close convincingly above this line on significant volume. The Initial Target: A successful Bitcoin breakout sets a first price target near $95,000. The Next Milestone: A move to $95K significantly increases the probability of a final push to the symbolic $100,000 level. Therefore, the $95,000 mark isn‚Äôt just a random number; it‚Äôs a calculated projection based on chart structure and becomes the pivotal level for confirming a true trend reversal. What Could Fuel or Hinder the Rally? While the setup is promising, traders should consider both sides. The potential fuel for a rally is clear: reduced derivatives pressure, positive market structure, and a general sense that prices have consolidated enough. A clean Bitcoin breakout could trigger a wave of algorithmic and momentum buying. However, challenges remain. The broader macroeconomic environment, including interest rate decisions and traditional market volatility, still influences crypto. Additionally, the resistance line is a formidable barrier. A rejection here could see Bitcoin fall back into its established trading range, delaying the anticipated surge. The key is sustained buying pressure at the critical moment. Actionable Insights for Crypto Watchers How should you process this information? First, monitor the daily chart for a strong close above the descending trendline. Volume is a critical confirmation‚Äîa breakout on low volume is less trustworthy. Second, understand that a move toward $95,000 would likely be a process, not a single event, possibly involving pullbacks to test the newfound support. For long-term investors, this analysis reinforces the importance of viewing volatility as part of the journey. For active traders, the $95K level serves as a clear intermediate target and a zone to watch for either continuation or consolidation signals. The overarching message from analysts is one of cautious optimism, with a defined technical roadmap. Conclusion: A Defining Moment for Bitcoin The coming days and weeks could be defining for Bitcoin‚Äôs 2024 trajectory. Analysts have laid out a clear narrative: a successful Bitcoin breakout from its multi-month downtrend, catalyzed by shifting derivatives dynamics and technical momentum, with $95,000 acting as the crucial pivot point. While never guaranteed in markets, this confluence of factors presents one of the more compelling bullish setups seen in recent months. The market now waits to see if Bitcoin has the strength to seize this opportunity. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is causing the potential Bitcoin breakout now? The primary drivers are the removal of significant options-related selling pressure and Bitcoin‚Äôs price testing a key multi-month resistance line for a potential breakout. Why is $95,000 considered a pivotal level? Analysts from Crypto Ideology identify $95K as the initial technical target following a confirmed breakout above the current downtrend, based on chart measurements. What happens if Bitcoin fails to break the resistance? A rejection at the trendline would likely mean continued consolidation or a move back into the previous trading range, delaying the bullish scenario. Is the $100,000 target still realistic? Analysts view $100K as a high-probability target after a successful hold above $95,000, making the $95K level the critical hurdle to clear first. Should I invest based on this analysis? This is market analysis, not financial advice. Always conduct your own research, consider your risk tolerance, and understand that cryptocurrency investments are volatile. Found this breakdown of the potential Bitcoin breakout helpful? Share this article with your network on X (Twitter) or Telegram to discuss these critical levels with other crypto enthusiasts. What‚Äôs your target for BTC? To learn more about the latest Bitcoin trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action and institutional adoption. title: Dogecoin Is Repeating Its 2020 Accumulation Cycle, Analyst Says
body: Crypto analyst Cryptollica (@Cryptollica on X) is arguing that Dogecoin‚Äôs weekly chart is doing that familiar thing again: carving out a rounded base, bleeding off volatility, resetting momentum and quietly setting up what he frames as the ‚Äúcalm before the storm.‚Äù Or, at least, that‚Äôs the pitch. In a Dec. 23 TradingView analysis titled ‚ÄúDOGE: The Cycle Repeats (1W Timeframe),‚Äù Cryptollica calls the current structure a ‚Äútextbook fractal setup,‚Äù pointing to four prior ‚Äústructural points (1, 2, 3, 4)‚Äù across DOGE‚Äôs longer-term history and claiming the market is now sitting at ‚ÄúPoint 4.‚Äù The core claim is less about a single indicator and more about pattern recognition: ‚Äúthe structure is rhyming perfectly with the pre-bull run accumulation phases of the past.‚Äù Will Dogecoin Repeat History? Cryptollica frames Zones 1 and 2 as prior ‚Äúboredom phases‚Äù ‚Äî the type of long, dead-feeling stretches that, in hindsight, look like accumulation. ‚ÄúZones 1 & 2: These were the ‚Äòboredom phases‚Äô where volatility died, and smart money accumulated,‚Äù the post reads. Zone 2, in particular, is described as ‚Äúthe launchpad for the massive 2021 parabolic run.‚Äù The current period, which the analyst labels Zone 4, is presented as a near-mirror: ‚ÄúWe are seeing the exact same rounding bottom formation. The price is stabilizing, forming a heavy base just like it did before the previous explosions.‚Äù Related Reading: Dogecoin Price Could Rally If It Reclaims This Fibonacci Level That‚Äôs the structural argument. The momentum argument is RSI, and Cryptollica is unusually direct about how they‚Äôre treating it: ‚ÄúLook at the RSI indicator at the bottom. The red line (~32. level) acts as a historical floor.‚Äù They add that ‚Äúevery single time the weekly RSI touched or hovered near this baseline (Points 1, 2, and 3), it marked a macro bottom.‚Äù Right now, in their read, ‚Äúthe RSI has reset back to this critical support level,‚Äù which they interpret as seller fatigue: ‚ÄúIt indicates that the sellers are exhausted and the momentum is primed to flip.‚Äù If you‚Äôve been around crypto markets long enough, you‚Äôve seen this exact rhetorical move: the past as a template, the present as a rhyme, the future as a pending punchline. Cryptollica tries to pre-empt the eye-roll by insisting the setup isn‚Äôt coincidence: ‚ÄúThis isn‚Äôt just random noise; it‚Äôs a cyclical reset.‚Äù The post argues DOGE is sitting in what they call ‚Äúthe ‚ÄòGolden Pocket‚Äô for accumulation,‚Äù and suggests that if the 2020-era analog holds ‚Äúlike it did in 2020 (Zone 2)‚Äù then today‚Äôs price action is basically quiet loading time. The editorial machinery at TradingView itself leaned in. The platform responded publicly on Dec. 23 that the publication ‚Äúhas been selected as one of our Editor‚Äôs Picks and will be featured on the Home Page,‚Äù adding a line that reads like the house style for community encouragement: ‚ÄúGood trading plans are valuable, regardless of their outcomes, and particularly rewarding when they succeed.‚Äù Cryptollica replied in kind: ‚ÄúTradingView, thank you.‚Äù Related Reading: Dogecoin: Why This One Price Level Is Drawing All the Attention Still, one of the more useful parts of this whole thread is a cautionary comment from another user, ZarinSyed, who essentially says: yes, the fractal is interesting, no, that doesn‚Äôt mean it‚Äôs fate. ‚ÄúThe fractal analysis is compelling,‚Äù they wrote, ‚Äúhowever, while the setup does resemble prior accumulation phases, it‚Äôs worth noting that fractals are not deterministic ‚Äî macro conditions and liquidity flows can alter outcomes.‚Äù They put a practical marker on what ‚Äúconfirmation‚Äù would look like in their view: ‚ÄúWatching DOGE‚Äôs weekly close above the $0.15‚Äì$0.17 range could validate the bullish thesis.‚Äù And they don‚Äôt let RSI off the hook, either. The ~32 level may signal exhaustion, they concede, but ‚Äúmomentum confirmation often requires a sustained move above the midline (50). Until then, the risk of prolonged sideways action remains.‚Äù They add a market-structure wrinkle that matters for 2026-style crypto narratives: ‚ÄúUnlike 2020, DOGE now trades in a more mature market with ETF-driven institutional flows. Retail-driven fractals may play out differently.‚Äù So what does it mean, in plain trader terms, without pretending the chart is prophecy? Cryptollica is making a high-conviction, weekly-timeframe claim that DOGE is back in an accumulation ‚Äúbuy zone,‚Äù with RSI near a historical floor and a rounded base that resembles prior cycle setups. ZarinSyed is basically saying: fine, now prove it, ideally with a breakout and follow-through, and keep an eye on relative metrics like DOGE/BTC dominance if you want to know whether this is a DOGE story or just another alt wobble. At press time, DOGE traded at $ Featured image created with DALL.E, chart from TradingView.com

title: Bitcoin Whales Buy Big as Gold and Silver Surge and BTC Stalls in a Tight Range
body: Bitcoin‚Äôs largest holders ramped up accumulation in late 2025, even as gold and silver outperformed Bitcoin over the past six months. Meanwhile, BTC stayed stuck in a narrow $85,000 to $92,000 band after a sharp drop from above $110,000. On chain data shows large Bitcoin holders boosted balances in late 2025 On-chain data from Glassnode showed a sharp jump in net buying by entities holding 100 BTC to 1,000 BTC, a cohort often tracked as ‚Äúsharks.‚Äù The move came as Bitcoin‚Äôs price stayed near cycle highs, while the group‚Äôs total supply line climbed to a new peak on the chart. A post from ‚ÄúThat Martini Guy‚Äù claimed ‚Äúwhales‚Äù accumulated about $23.5 billion worth of Bitcoin over recent weeks and called it the fastest pace since 2012. The Glassnode chart does show one of the strongest positive spikes in the cohort‚Äôs net position change in years, alongside a steep rise in the amount of BTC held by these addresses. Still, the chart tracks a specific bracket, not every whale sized wallet, and the dollar figure depends on the price used for the estimate. In addition, on-chain cohorts can shift when exchanges reshuffle wallets, when custody providers consolidate addresses, or when entities get re labeled over time. Even so, the late 2025 surge signals renewed demand from larger holders, and it points to aggressive accumulation rather than steady distribution in that period. Precious metals surge as Bitcoin lags over six month window Meanwhile, Gold and Silver posted strong gains over the past six months, while Bitcoin moved in the opposite direction, according to the price comparison data. Gold rose about 38 percent over the period, and silver more than doubled, climbing roughly 107 percent. By contrast, Bitcoin fell about 17 percent, despite holding a market capitalization near $1.8 trillion. BTC/XAU/XAG Price Comparison. Source: CoinCodex The chart shows a clear divergence that developed from late summer into year end. Gold advanced steadily, with limited pullbacks, reflecting sustained demand. Silver accelerated even faster, with sharper rallies in October and November that pushed returns well above gold. Meanwhile, Bitcoin trended lower through the same period, with several failed rebounds and deeper drawdowns into December. This split highlights how capital rotated toward traditional safe haven assets during the period, while Bitcoin underperformed both metals. Even so, the gap between assets has widened to levels not seen earlier in the year. The data shows metals leading decisively, while Bitcoin remains compressed near the lower end of its six month range, setting a clear contrast in relative performance. Bitcoin compresses into tight range after sharp pullback Bitcoin traded sideways in late December after a steep decline from its recent highs, according to the daily BTC USDT chart from TradingView. Price moved into a narrow consolidation band near the mid to high $80,000s, following a breakdown from a broader distribution zone that capped advances earlier in the year. The chart shows Bitcoin falling from above $110,000 before stabilizing between roughly $85,000 and $92,000. Multiple candles printed long wicks on both sides of the range, signaling active two way trading rather than a clear trend. This structure suggests the market is absorbing prior selling pressure after the sharp drop. Crypto Rover said a decisive move could follow once Bitcoin exits this range. The chart supports that view, as prolonged compression often precedes expansion. For now, price remains trapped between short term support and resistance, leaving direction unresolved until a clear breakout or breakdown occurs.

title: Crypto‚Äôs High-Stakes Corner Booms As Derivatives Trading Soars To $86 Trillion
body: According to a report by liquidation tracker CoinGlass, cryptocurrency derivatives trading hit roughly $85.7 trillion in 2025, an average of about $264 billion a day. That surge put derivatives back at the center of crypto activity and left a clear imprint on markets worldwide. Market Concentration And Exchange Share Binance handled roughly $25 trillion of that volume, or about 29% of global derivatives trading. OKX, Bybit and Bitget each posted between $8 trillion and $10 trillion, and the four of them together controlled about 62% of the market. Based on reports , that level of concentration means a handful of platforms still drive most of the action, and any major hiccup at one of them can ripple through other venues fast. Crypto: Institutional Pathways Expanded Trading moved beyond retail bets. Spot ETFs listed in the US, options desks and compliant futures helped mainstream venues such as the Chicago Mercantile Exchange gain ground. The CME had already overtaken Binance in Bitcoin futures open interest in 2024, and it consolidated that position through 2025. More institutions started using derivatives for hedging and basis trades rather than pure speculation. That change pushed pricing patterns to look more like traditional markets, even as new risks built up under the surface. Open Interest And Market Swings Open interest began the year near a low of about $87 billion after a broad round of deleveraging in the first quarter. It then climbed through the middle of the year and reached a record $236 billion on October 7. An abrupt reset in early Q4 wiped out more than $70 billion in positions ‚Äî roughly one-third of the open interest at the time. Even after that shock, year-end open interest stood at $145 billion, a 17% rise from where the year began. Bitcoin Price Action Meanwhile, Bitcoin‚Äôs price has yet to breach the $90k level, trading at $89,950 at the time of writing. US-listed spot Bitcoin ETFs, on the other hand, recorded net outflows, weakening what some had called the institutional bid. A record-sized Bitcoin options expiry landed on Friday, Dec 26, and several analysts argued it kept price pinned in a tighter band ‚Äî at least for a while. Sentiment gauges stayed on the gloomy side, with many investors showing caution despite broader product access and more regulated routes to trade. Forced Liquidations Total forced liquidations across the year were estimated at about $150 billion. A big portion of the pain came on Oct. 10 and Oct. 11, when more than $19 billion was erased in just two days. The data for 2025 shows a market that has grown in size and in institutional involvement, while also carrying structural tensions. Trading volumes and product variety have increased, but so have the paths that can transmit shocks. Featured image from FXLeaders, chart from TradingView

title: Trust Wallet‚Äôs Decisive Move: Full Compensation for $7M Hack Victims
body: BitcoinWorld Trust Wallet‚Äôs Decisive Move: Full Compensation for $7M Hack Victims In a significant move for cryptocurrency security, Trust Wallet has committed to fully compensating users affected by a recent $7M hack. This announcement from Binance founder Changpeng Zhao brings relief to the crypto community and sets a new standard for accountability in self-custody solutions. The Trust Wallet hack incident highlights both the vulnerabilities and the evolving responsibility frameworks in decentralized finance. What Exactly Happened in the Trust Wallet Hack? According to reports from Cointelegraph, the Trust Wallet hack resulted in approximately $7 million in damages. The incident involved unauthorized access to user funds through the self-custody wallet platform. Changpeng Zhao, the founder of Binance which acquired Trust Wallet in 2018, personally addressed the situation to reassure users about their asset security. Zhao explained that while the investigation continues, all user funds remain fundamentally safe. The company‚Äôs immediate response demonstrates their commitment to user protection. This approach contrasts with many historical crypto incidents where users bore full responsibility for losses. Why Is Trust Wallet‚Äôs Compensation Promise Important? Trust Wallet‚Äôs decision to cover all losses represents a watershed moment for cryptocurrency security practices. Here are the key implications: User Protection Priority: By assuming financial responsibility, Trust Wallet places user security above profit considerations Industry Standard Setting: This move pressures other wallet providers to enhance their security and accountability measures Trust Reinforcement: Despite the Trust Wallet hack , the compensation promise actually strengthens user confidence in the platform Regulatory Alignment: This proactive approach aligns with increasing regulatory expectations for consumer protection in crypto How Does This Affect the Future of Crypto Security? The aftermath of the Trust Wallet hack provides valuable lessons for the entire cryptocurrency ecosystem. First, it demonstrates that even established, reputable platforms face security challenges. Second, it shows that responsible companies can turn security incidents into trust-building opportunities through transparent communication and financial accountability. For users, this incident reinforces several important practices: Always enable additional security features like two-factor authentication Regularly update wallet software to benefit from security patches Consider spreading assets across multiple storage solutions Stay informed about platform security updates and announcements What Can We Learn From This Security Incident? The Trust Wallet hack and subsequent compensation announcement offer crucial insights into the maturing cryptocurrency landscape. While the incident itself is concerning, the response sets a positive precedent for how crypto companies should handle security breaches. The investigation‚Äôs findings will likely lead to enhanced security protocols that benefit all Trust Wallet users and potentially influence industry-wide standards. Moreover, this situation highlights the importance of choosing platforms with strong backing and established reputations. Trust Wallet‚Äôs connection to Binance provided both the resources and the incentive to make users whole, which might not be the case with smaller, independent wallet providers. Conclusion: A Turning Point for Crypto Accountability The Trust Wallet hack compensation decision represents more than just damage control‚Äîit signals a fundamental shift toward greater accountability in cryptocurrency services. By prioritizing user protection over short-term financial considerations, Trust Wallet and Binance have demonstrated leadership that could reshape industry expectations. While security incidents remain concerning, this transparent and user-focused response provides a blueprint for how crypto companies can maintain trust through challenging circumstances. Frequently Asked Questions How much money was stolen in the Trust Wallet hack? The security incident resulted in approximately $7 million in damages, according to official reports from Trust Wallet and Binance. Will all affected users receive full compensation? Yes, Changpeng Zhao has confirmed that Trust Wallet will cover all losses from the hack, ensuring users are made whole. Is my Trust Wallet still safe to use after this incident? According to official statements, user funds remain safe, and the platform continues to operate normally while security enhancements are implemented. How long will the compensation process take? While no specific timeline has been provided, the company has committed to a thorough investigation followed by compensation distribution to affected users. What caused the Trust Wallet security breach? The investigation is ongoing, but the company has assured users that they will implement additional security measures based on their findings. Does this affect Trust Wallet‚Äôs relationship with Binance? No, Binance founder Changpeng Zhao‚Äôs personal involvement in announcing the compensation demonstrates continued strong support for Trust Wallet. Share This Important Crypto Security Update If you found this analysis of the Trust Wallet hack and compensation valuable, consider sharing it with your crypto community. This incident and response represent significant developments in cryptocurrency security and accountability that all investors should understand. Help spread awareness about evolving security standards in digital asset management by sharing this article on your social media platforms. To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency security trends, explore our article on key developments shaping wallet security and institutional adoption. This post Trust Wallet‚Äôs Decisive Move: Full Compensation for $7M Hack Victims first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: From Uncertainty to Clarity: Landmark Crypto Bill Could Unlock XRP‚Äôs Next Move
body: SEC Chairman Signals Crypto Clarity Act & Market Structure Bill Are Heading to Congress The U.S. cryptocurrency market may be on the brink of its most significant regulatory overhaul yet. According to remarks attributed to the SEC Chairman Paul Atkins, the long-anticipated Crypto Clarity Act and the Market Structure Bill are now heading to Congress , a move that could dramatically reshape the digital asset landscape. If passed, these reforms are expected to reduce market manipulation by as much as 80%, restoring confidence to a sector long plagued by regulatory uncertainty. At the heart of both bills is a push to clearly distinguish between digital assets that qualify as securities and those that function more like commodities or payment tokens. For years, the lack of clear definitions has created confusion for crypto firms, investors, and regulators alike. The proposed legislation aims to allocate oversight responsibilities more precisely between the SEC and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC), reducing enforcement-by-litigation and replacing it with rule-based clarity. Therefore, this clarity could be especially meaningful for XRP. Ripple‚Äôs token has been one of the most high-profile examples of regulatory ambiguity, spending years entangled in legal disputes over whether XRP should be classified as a security. While recent court rulings have already offered partial relief by differentiating between retail and institutional sales, comprehensive legislation could further solidify XRP‚Äôs regulatory status. If the Crypto Clarity Act provides explicit criteria under which tokens like XRP are deemed non-securities when used for payments or network utility. On the other hand, the Market Structure Bill could also benefit XRP by establishing standardized rules for trading venues, custody, and settlement. XRP‚Äôs use case as a bridge asset for cross-border payments aligns well with a regulated market structure that emphasizes transparency, compliance, and efficiency. Clear rules could accelerate partnerships between Ripple and traditional financial institutions, particularly banks seeking blockchain-based payment solutions that meet regulatory standards. Beyond XRP specifically, these bills could boost overall market sentiment. Regulatory certainty tends to reduce risk premiums, attract institutional capital, and foster innovation. For XRP, which already has an established infrastructure and real-world utility, being on the right side of regulatory clarity could translate into renewed demand and long-term growth. Conclusion The SEC Chairman‚Äôs confirmation that the Crypto Clarity Act and Market Structure Bill are headed to Congress signals a pivotal shift for U.S. crypto regulation. By replacing long-standing uncertainty with clear, enforceable rules, the legislation could unlock stalled growth across the industry with XRP expected to be a major beneficiary. Clear statutory definitions for digital assets and market oversight could finally lift the regulatory overhang, opening the door to deeper liquidity, broader exchange support, and increased institutional participation. If passed, these bills could not only legitimize XRP‚Äôs status as a compliant, utility-focused asset but also position it at the forefront of a more transparent, mature, and innovation-friendly crypto market.

title: Bitcoin Bear Market to Last Months: May Not Bottom Until Late 2026 (Analyst)
body: Bitcoin (BTC) traded flat on Christmas amidst cautious sentiment and reduced institutional participation. Market experts predict pain ahead. In fact, prominent crypto analyst Doctor Profit believes the asset could bottom out in September-October 2026. Long Bear Market for Bitcoin In a recent tweet, he explained that he has moved all remaining USDT back into the banking system and currently holds no liquid crypto assets, while citing the ongoing bear market as the reason. Doctor Profit said that the current market conditions do not warrant staying liquid in crypto, and he believes the bear phase will continue for a long period. He also disclosed his largest positions, including a BTC short from the $115,000-$125,000 range and a medium-sized BTC holding purchased around 85,000. He intends to ride a potential short-term upswing toward $107,000 before the next downward leg in February-March. Currently, Bitcoin is trading at $89,259 after a 2% daily gain. While the asset did show some short-term upward movement, it continues to hover below crucial resistance levels. According to CryptoQuant, $100,000 is a major short-term resistance for BTC, largely due to the concentration of cost bases among recent whale investors and Binance users. New whales, who have held Bitcoin for less than 155 days, have an average cost basis of roughly $100,500. This makes it a critical break-even zone where profit-taking or fresh accumulation could determine the near-term price trend. On the other hand, Binance spot users average around $56,000, providing a significant support level in a potential extended bear phase. Long-term whales with holdings over 155 days have an average cost basis of around $40,000, which means that they remain significantly profitable and are likely contributing to recent profit-taking activity. $40K Drop Risk Supporting the broader bearish narrative, analyst Ali Martinez recently highlighted Bitcoin‚Äôs behavior around the 50-week simple moving average (SMA). He explained that in past cycles, losing this level has typically led to an average decline of about 54%. When applied to current prices, such a move would mean a potential drop toward $40,000. The analyst did not call for an immediate selloff, but did warn that failure to reclaim this level could expose the crypto asset to extended downside pressure. The post Bitcoin Bear Market to Last Months: May Not Bottom Until Late 2026 (Analyst) appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Midnight Blockchain: The Revolutionary Manhattan Project for Privacy Tech
body: BitcoinWorld Midnight Blockchain: The Revolutionary Manhattan Project for Privacy Tech Imagine a digital world where you can prove your identity, complete a transaction, or access a service without ever revealing your personal data. This is the ambitious vision behind the Midnight blockchain , a new project from the Cardano ecosystem that its founder, Charles Hoskinson, is calling nothing less than the ‚ÄúManhattan Project‚Äù for privacy technology. But what does this dramatic comparison mean for the future of crypto and data security? What is the Midnight Blockchain Project? Charles Hoskinson, the visionary founder of Cardano (ADA), has set his sights on a monumental challenge: building the ultimate privacy-preserving blockchain. He has dubbed this new spin-off project, Midnight , the ‚ÄúManhattan Project‚Äù for privacy-enhancing technologies (PETs). This historical reference signals a focused, intensive, and groundbreaking effort to solve one of digital society‚Äôs core dilemmas‚Äîhow to balance transparency with personal privacy. Hoskinson is deeply immersed in the technical work, reportedly writing 80 to 100 pages of documentation daily. An internal workshop is planned for January to accelerate development. The goal is clear: to create a foundational technology that redefines how data is handled on-chain. Why is Midnight Being Called a Privacy Revolution? The core innovation of the Midnight blockchain lies in its use of Privacy-Enhancing Technologies (PETs). Simply put, PETs are cryptographic tools that allow for computation and verification without exposing the underlying raw data. For example, you could prove you are over 18 without showing your birthdate, or verify a transaction‚Äôs validity without revealing the amount or parties involved. Midnight aims to integrate these technologies at its core, focusing on three critical pillars: Privacy-Enhancing Technologies (PETs): The bedrock for confidential computation. Chain Abstraction: Simplifying user interaction across different blockchains. Smart Compliance: Enabling regulatory requirements to be met automatically and privately. This triad addresses the major pain points of current public blockchains: data exposure, complexity, and regulatory uncertainty. What Challenges Will the Midnight Blockchain Face? Labeling a project the ‚ÄúManhattan Project‚Äù sets incredibly high expectations. The original was a secretive, state-funded mission with a single, clear objective. Replicating that intensity in the open-source, decentralized world of crypto presents unique hurdles. Firstly, achieving robust, scalable, and user-friendly privacy is a formidable technical challenge. Secondly, the project must navigate the complex global landscape of financial regulations. ‚ÄúSmart compliance‚Äù is an elegant concept, but its practical implementation will be closely watched by regulators worldwide. Finally, it must gain adoption and trust from developers and users who are cautious of new, unproven networks. How Could Midnight Reshape the Crypto Landscape? If successful, the Midnight blockchain could unlock transformative use cases. Consider supply chain tracking where companies can prove ethical sourcing without exposing sensitive supplier data. Envision financial services where loans are approved based on private credit scores, or digital voting systems that are both verifiable and anonymous. For the Cardano ecosystem, a successful Midnight sidechain could drive significant utility and value to ADA, positioning it as a hub for secure, enterprise-grade decentralized applications. It represents a strategic move beyond pure currency into the realm of confidential data infrastructure. Conclusion: A New Dawn for Data Privacy? Charles Hoskinson‚Äôs comparison of Midnight to the Manhattan Project is a powerful statement of intent. It is not merely an upgrade; it is a dedicated mission to build a new paradigm for privacy on the blockchain. While the path ahead is steep, the potential reward‚Äîa world where individuals and businesses can operate with both transparency and confidentiality‚Äîis profound. The crypto community will be watching closely as this ambitious project moves from intense documentation to a working reality. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q: What is the Midnight blockchain? A: Midnight is a privacy-focused blockchain and sidechain project from the Cardano ecosystem, designed to be a foundational platform for privacy-enhancing technologies (PETs). Q: Why is it called the ‚ÄúManhattan Project‚Äù? A: Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson uses the term to emphasize the project‚Äôs intense, focused, and groundbreaking mission to solve core challenges in data privacy and blockchain technology. Q: How does Midnight protect privacy? A: It uses Privacy-Enhancing Technologies (PETs), which are cryptographic methods that allow data to be verified and computed without ever exposing the original, sensitive information. Q: Is Midnight a separate cryptocurrency from Cardano‚Äôs ADA? A: Midnight is a separate blockchain project (a sidechain) within the Cardano ecosystem. It will have its own tokenomics and rules but is designed to interoperate with the main Cardano chain. Q: What are the main goals of the Midnight blockchain? A: Its three main pillars are advancing Privacy-Enhancing Technologies (PETs), enabling seamless chain abstraction for users, and building tools for smart, automated compliance with regulations. Q: When will Midnight launch? A: There is no official public launch date yet. Development is in active stages, with an internal workshop planned for January to advance the technical groundwork. title: What‚Äôs the Best Crypto to Buy Before BTC Hits 150K?
body: As Bitcoin (BTC) moves closer to the highly anticipated 150K milestone, the market focus is already shifting toward early-stage projects that are positioned to benefit from the next expansion cycle. History shows that while Bitcoin (BTC) leads the rally, the strongest gains often come from platforms that enter the market with real utility, clear demand, and solid structure. This is exactly where Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will stand out as a new crypto coin designed to attract serious crypto investment attention before the broader market catches on. Presale Momentum Is Building Before the Market Turns Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is progressing through its presale with strong participation across all phases. The total supply is fixed at 4 billion tokens, and combining all presale phases so far, around $19.45 million has already been generated. The current presale price is set at $0.035, offering early participants an entry point before broader exposure. More than 18,600 holders have joined across all phases, reflecting growing confidence in the project‚Äôs direction. In the current phase, 98% of the 170 million token allocation has already been sold, signaling tightening availability as demand continues to rise. A major accessibility update has further strengthened presale momentum. Investors can now purchase MUTM tokens using a card, with no purchase limits. This change will remove barriers for new participants and will accelerate onboarding as the presale approaches later stages. As Bitcoin (BTC)‚Äôs upward trajectory continues to draw new capital into the market, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will already be positioned with a strong base of holders and limited remaining supply at early pricing. A Lending Platform Built for Real Market Use Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will be a decentralized lending and borrowing protocol designed around two complementary models that address different risk profiles. In simple terms, the platform will allow users to lend assets to earn interest or borrow assets by providing more collateral than they borrow, ensuring system stability. The first model, Peer-to-Contract (P2C), will focus on well-known and liquid assets. Lenders will pool assets such as stablecoins and established cryptocurrencies into audited smart contracts. Borrowers will access these pools by providing overcollateralized positions. Interest rates will automatically adjust based on pool usage, rising as demand increases and easing when liquidity is abundant. This dynamic structure will create balance, encouraging deposits while discouraging excessive borrowing. Depositors in P2C will receive mtTokens, which will represent their share of the pool along with accumulated interest. These mtTokens will also function as collateral, unlocking additional flexibility within the system. Borrowers will be able to choose between variable rates that respond to market conditions or stable rates that offer predictable repayment costs. Stable rates will begin at a higher level to reflect added certainty and will rebalance under defined conditions to protect liquidity. For assets that carry higher volatility or lower liquidity, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will introduce a separate Peer-to-Peer (P2P) lending model. This environment will isolate riskier tokens such as meme coins from the core liquidity pools. In P2P lending, borrowers and lenders will negotiate terms directly, including interest rates and loan duration. Since there will be no shared pool, lenders will accept greater risk in exchange for higher returns. This structure will preserve overall protocol safety while expanding earning opportunities across different market segments. Audit and Protocol Announcement on X and Impact Security remains a central focus. An independent audit by Halborn Security thoroughly testing Mutuum Finance‚Äôs lending and borrowing contracts for vulnerabilities and errors. With the code finalized, this review will ensure reliability, correct functionality, and strong protection for users, reinforcing trust as the platform approaches launch. The protocol‚Äôs first version is expected to launch on the Sepolia Testnet in Q4 2025. Version 1 will include core components such as liquidity pools, mtTokens, debt tokens, and a liquidator bot. Initial supported assets will include ETH and USDT for lending, borrowing, and collateral use. All loans will require overcollateralization, monitored through a Stability Factor. When collateral values fall below required thresholds, liquidations will activate automatically, preventing bad debt from affecting the wider system. Deploying V1 on the testnet gives the community an early opportunity to interact with the platform before the mainnet rollout. This phased launch promotes openness, supports early user involvement, and allows the team to gather actionable feedback to refine the protocol. As participation expands and awareness grows, confidence in the ecosystem may strengthen, helping to support long-term interest and demand for the MUTM token. One of the strongest selling points of Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will be its expected simultaneous platform launch and token listing. Instead of releasing a token without functionality, the project is expected to debut with live lending and borrowing modules on day one. This coordinated rollout will create immediate utility, encouraging active participation from traders and lenders alike. The presence of a working product will also support faster consideration from Tier-1 and Tier-2 exchanges, driving visibility and volume. As Bitcoin (BTC) approaches 150K, attention will increasingly shift toward projects that combine timing with substance. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will enter the market with capped supply, strong presale traction, audited contracts, and an in process dual lending system designed for real demand. With phase 6 nearing full allocation and accessibility expanding through card purchases, the window for early positioning is narrowing fast. title: Russia, US Discuss Crypto Mining at Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Plant Without Kyiv, Putin Says
body: Russia and the United States have discussed the possibility of jointly managing the Russian-controlled Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Power Plant, including using its electricity for Bitcoin mining, Russian President Vladimir Putin said, according to remarks cited by Kommersant and reposted by KyivPost. The talks did not include Ukraine, Putin added, even though the plant remains on Ukrainian territory under international law. Putin said U.S. representatives showed interest in directing excess electricity from the facility toward cryptocurrency mining operations. At the same time, he claimed Washington also raised the idea of supplying electricity from the plant to Ukraine. Kyiv has not confirmed any such discussions and has repeatedly opposed arrangements that bypass Ukrainian authorities. The Zaporizhzhia facility, Europe‚Äôs largest nuclear power plant, has been under Russian control since March 2022. Its status remains one of the most sensitive issues in the war, touching on energy security, nuclear safety, and sovereignty. Control Talks Sideline Ukraine According to Putin, discussions with the United States focused on ‚Äújoint management‚Äù of the plant without Ukraine‚Äôs involvement. He said Ukrainian technical staff continue to work at the facility but now hold Russian passports, a claim Ukrainian officials have previously rejected as illegitimate. Ukrainian authorities have instead promoted alternative frameworks. In recent comments reported by RBC Ukraine , Kyiv proposed a model of joint operation that would involve Ukraine and international partners, not bilateral talks between Moscow and Washington. Ukrainian officials argue that any governance arrangement must restore Ukrainian control and ensure demilitarization of the site. The International Atomic Energy Agency has maintained a presence at Zaporizhzhia and continues to warn about safety risks linked to military activity near the plant. Power disruptions and reliance on backup systems have kept the facility in a fragile operating state. Energy Crisis and Crypto Angle The comments come as Ukraine enters winter with a strained power grid. A recent report by The Wall Street Journal described ongoing attacks on energy infrastructure that have forced rolling outages across the country, increasing pressure to secure stable electricity supplies. Against that backdrop, the idea of using nuclear-generated power for crypto mining adds a new dimension to the dispute. Bitcoin mining requires large, steady energy inputs, and nuclear plants provide consistent baseload power. However, critics argue that raising crypto mining in talks about a war-zone nuclear facility highlights how far negotiations have drifted from Ukraine‚Äôs priorities. Kyiv has said it will not recognize any agreements over Zaporizhzhia made without its consent. For now, claims of U.S. interest in crypto mining remain unconfirmed by Washington, while the plant‚Äôs future stays tied to broader negotiations over territory and security.

title: Analyst: Next XRP Explosive Rally Is Coming Soon. Here‚Äôs why
body: Crypto analyst CryptoBull (@CryptoBull2020) has returned focus to XRP‚Äôs long-term structure, pointing to a recurring behavior that has defined its biggest historical moves. His analysis centers on XRP‚Äôs tendency to spend extended periods consolidating inside wedge formations before resolving with sharp upward expansions. The weekly chart he shared highlights this pattern across multiple market cycles, raising questions about whether XRP is nearing another decisive phase. #XRP loves to consolidate in wedges. Next explosive move up coming soon pic.twitter.com/8cRL98elUX ‚Äî CryptoBull (@CryptoBull2020) December 23, 2025 Repeating Consolidation Phases on the Weekly Chart At first glance, XRP‚Äôs recent price action appears uneventful. However, consolidation has often preceded major trend changes in XRP‚Äôs history. The chart outlines several large wedge structures stretching back more than a decade. Each wedge formation indicates a period where price action tightened between converging trendlines. The first wedge began in 2014, and XRP remained within this formation until it began a rapid ascent in 2017. However, it paused and entered another wedge for a few months before resuming its climb. This move culminated in its previous peak of $3.36 in January 2018. Recently, XRP entered the longest wedge in its history. It attempted to break out of this formation, but its price was held back by the legal battle between Ripple and the SEC. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 The 2024 Breakout and the Current Wedge In late 2024, the crypto market began a massive rally after Donald Trump‚Äôs victory in the U.S. election. XRP rode this wave, breaking out of that multi-year consolidation and rising by over 500%. Following this move, XRP continued that climb in 2025, reaching a new peak of $3.65 in July . However, the asset‚Äôs momentum has stalled, and CryptoBull‚Äôs chart shows it trading within another wedge. The rallies that followed the previous wedges were not marginal. They defined XRP‚Äôs most aggressive upside periods. A repeat of this pattern could send XRP to new heights. Where XRP May Be Headed Next CryptoBull suggests that XRP is approaching another inflection point. The chart shows XRP near the apex of the current wedge, and he believes the surge is imminent. Many analysts are convinced that XRP will rise significantly in 2026 , and CryptoBull‚Äôs chart supports that idea. While the analyst does not provide a specific price target, the context of the chart implies a quick transition from consolidation to expansion. A sustained break above long-term resistance would mark a structural shift rather than a short-term breakout. title: Lithuania Warns Crypto Firms: No License, No Business After December 31
body: Lithuania‚Äôs central bank has issued a clear warning to cryptocurrency companies operating in the country. The Bank of Lithuania said crypto service providers that fail to secure the required license by December 31 will be treated as operating illegally and may face enforcement action. The message targets firms offering crypto exchange services and custodial wallets to Lithuanian users. According to the regulator, only companies licensed under the European Union‚Äôs Markets in Crypto Assets framework, known as MiCA , will be allowed to continue operating after the transition period ends. The announcement places pressure on dozens of firms that registered in Lithuania during earlier, lighter regulatory regimes. Many now face a hard deadline to either comply with EU wide rules or exit the market. The regulator stressed that licensing can be obtained either directly from Lithuania or from another EU member state. However, firms must hold an approved MiCA authorization to operate across the bloc. Registration alone will no longer be sufficient. While it did not list specific sanctions, Lithuanian law allows for fines, orders to cease operations, and removal from the national crypto register. Users Urged to Check Providers Early Alongside the warning to firms, the Bank of Lithuania issued guidance to crypto users. It urged customers to check whether their service provider has applied for or obtained a MiCA license before the end of the year. If a provider plans to exit the market, users should act before December 31. The regulator said clients can request transfers of crypto assets to licensed providers or to self hosted wallets under their own control. For fiat balances, customers may instruct providers to move funds to personal bank accounts or to other payment institutions, depending on contract terms. The central bank said early action reduces the risk of service disruptions or delays. Part of a Broader EU Regulatory Shift Lithuania was once a popular hub for crypto firms due to its fast registration process. However, EU regulators have since moved to tighten oversight following market collapses and consumer losses in recent years. MiCA introduces unified rules on licensing, governance, capital requirements, and consumer protection across the EU. National regulators, including the Bank of Lithuania, now play a supervisory role only over licensed entities. As the deadline approaches, Lithuania‚Äôs message is direct. Crypto companies must meet EU standards or leave the market. Users, meanwhile, are being told not to wait until the final days to secure their assets.

title: BTC and ETH options see largest year-end expiry on record
body: BTC and ETH markets absorbed the annual options expiry on Deribit. The event closed with record $28B in notional value. Deribit options reached the peak day of expiry, combining the monthly, quarterly, and yearly event. Historically, large-scale options repositioning has led to market volatility. Deribit is also closely watched for a hint on trader sentiment and the potential to determine the future direction of BTC. gm to everyone who knows that the largest options expiry day of the year is here ‚Äî Deribit (@DeribitOfficial) December 26, 2025 On Friday, 267,000 BTC options expire, with a put-to-call ratio of 0.35. The notional value of yearly BTC options is a total of $23.6B, with maximum pain above current prices at $95,000. On the Ethereum market, a total of 1.28M options expired, with a nominal value of $3.71B and maximum pain at $3,100. Deribit marks the largest options expiry in history The options market in 2025 gained influence, as a way to protect from the downside to BTC trading. The yearly event with $28B in total options is the largest in trading history, reflecting the increasing scale of cryptocurrency activity and the effect of institutions and whales. The event will affect more than half the open options positions on Deribit. Ahead of the settlement, trading volumes also rose due to repositioning. After the settlement, March options are the most influential, accumulating 30% of open interest. Deribit awaits a record options expiry event, with $28B in notional positions expiring, out of a total open interest of $42B. | Source: CoinGlass . The options expire at a time when the crypto fear and greed index is at 27 points , slightly up from last week‚Äôs 21 points. The options accumulation followed an increasingly volatile market for BTC and ETH. The leading coins are also pressured by multiple factors, including slow trading during the year-end period, as well as a general loss of positive sentiment. The fourth quarter of 2025 is also one of the worst in crypto history, despite expectations for a year in the green. BTC reached new price records, but quickly broke down, following unexpected market volatility. As a result, the options market reflected seller strategies and attempts to protect from a bear market downside. Deribit options point to ongoing fears of BTC dip After repositioning, Deribit options are signaling further expectations of a downside for BTC . During previous options expiry events, most Deribit traders set up put options at $85,000 to $80,000. Currently, the most numerous options by strike price are at $75,000, with high levels still available at $80,000 and $85,000. Call options start growing above $90,000, where traders are signaling a return to a potential bull market. BTC traded at $88,701.51, remaining in a narrow range for the past month. Despite this, any attempt to break out above $90,000 has invited more selling and long liquidations. The yearly options expiry is also expected to bring more volatility, with some price range anomalies during the low-volume trading period. Get $50 free to trade crypto when you sign up to Bybit now
